description:
Montreal, June 9, 2014 - Eryk Warren presents two ways to track latencies in your code -- line_profiler and kernprof (development) or chronometer (production).

Useful links:

* Eryk: https://twitter.com/ErykWarren
* line_profiler: http://sflx.ca/lprofiler
* matplotlib: http://matplotlib.org/
* MP47: http://sflx.ca/mp47
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Identifying latencies in your code
